query:
SELECT 
  a.id as analise_id,
  a.created_at,
  COUNT(*) as total_relatorios,
  COUNT(r.loja_id) as com_loja_id,
  COUNT(*) - COUNT(r.loja_id) as sem_loja_id
FROM analises_fichas_servico a
JOIN relatorios_analise_loja r ON r.analise_id = a.id
GROUP BY a.id, a.created_at
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
